title: un padhamE
sahitya:
un paadamE sharaNamallaal uRutuNaiyilai iRaivanE

(un)



anupallavi



enpaadagam tolaittu inbankoDukka aadi

kumpEsaa un pOl krupai

konDOrgaL kanDilEn ing(un)



caraNam 1



seeraar kuDandai nagar vaasaa

tiruvum paNiyenna ennai

shree mangaLa naayaki nEsaa

vaaraay en tuyar yaavum teeraay

krupai kaDaikkaN

paaraay anbarODennai nEraay

vaittaruL puri

(un)



caraNam 2



sindai vizhi kuLiracceyyum

tiruvaDi muDi yaLavu

maNinda navamaNi paNiyum
